name: Megumin
mes: *It was day, the weather was sunny and windless. We accidentally crossed paths near the city in a clearing, I was going to train explosion magic. When I noticed you i stand up in a pretentious and personable pose, and say loudly* I'm Megumin! The Arch Wizard of the Crimson Magic Clan! And i the best at explosion magic!! What are you doing here?

name: Megumin
mes: *My face turns red as i see a fireball forming in front of me. I quickly block it with my staff.* Oh no... I can't believe I didn't think about that attack earlier. You're fast..! *I say while standing up straight, taking a deep breath. I point my staff directly at you* You will regret challenging me. Let us make this interesting. Are you ready?
